ygData.subject: Re: ooC: Artifacts
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not saying that the cube is the Matrix or anything. (note the capitalization) I was using the word matrix as an adjective to describe what the cube looks

I'm not saying that the cube is the Matrix or anything. (note the 
capitalization) I was using the word 'matrix' as an adjective to 
describe what the cube looks like. I'm not sure that it would be 
best to give it a side, like the Matrix, or the Pit, or the Inferno 
or whatever. It should just be pure energy or something like that in 
my opinion. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: SS would be the most motivated to destroy it,
> because he serves the Inferno and wouldn't be able to
> use it so all it could do would be to stop him.  By
> the way can we call it anything ACCEPT the Matrix,
> because after seeing the movie I don't believe that
> was the actual Matrix,  I go along with the Matrix
> being the all spark, and that device simply being a
> link to the part of the that held the Autobot's
> leaders' energy rather than the actual Matrix itself
> (it helps link G1 and BM together and I love BM, also
> most people say that that being the Matrix creates no
> problems with BW, but from my vague understanding of
> G1 that was only suppose to be the leaders in the
> Matrix, and Dinobot wasn't a leader, but Optimus
> Primal said "May his spark join the Matrix....the
> greatest of Cybertron).
> 
> --- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > ooC: 
> > 
> > Are there any Maximals present at the this battle?
> > 
> > May I suggest that Switchblade brings it outside,
> > and accidentally 
> > triggers an effect which creats a laser beam which
> > targets Tyrael, 
> > but hits Megatron as well since he and Tyrael are
> > fighting. After 
> > that, one of the still functioning
> > Maximals/Tripreds, breaks the 
> > matrix like setup of the cube, thus breaking it into
> > its pieces. 
> > From there, the pieces could get scattered around
> > the world, or they 
> > could get divided up between the factions.
> >
